reviews.text: Excellent premises with top notch facilities for athletes at Sport Singapore within Singapore Sports Hub. It is easily accessible, just beside Stadium MRT station literally, on the ground floor. Always security manning the counter which gives everyone inside peace of mind. Sports associations like Singapore Athletics inside too. Thank you Sport Singapore for advancing sports! ðŸ‡¸ðŸ‡¬

ActiveSG ++ app, and while it offers access to various activities and bookings, its inflexible refund policy is a major drawback.  The app does not offer refunds for unintentional mistakes, which is unacceptable.  In today's digital world, users make mistakes â€“ be it accidentally double-booking a slot or misreading the booking details.  A rigid "no refund" policy is not only unfair but also discourages users from utilizing the app.  This inflexibility significantly detracts from the overall user experience and makes me hesitant to recommend the app to others.  The lack of leniency in handling such situations is a serious flaw that needs immediate attention.  I would advise potential users to carefully consider this significant limitation before committing to using the app.  Thumbs down..

Cannot find the avtivesg support center at all. Follow the Google map lead me to dead end and glass panels, finally found a door and it is locked, no sign or anything to tell is it the right direction

Collected active health play mat, smooth transaction. Slightly over A4 size when packed, double-sided design. Portable. Can put yoga mat or cushion underneath for support when working on it.

WHAT IS A PLAY MAT?
The Play Mat is a multi-purpose mat which allows you to assess, step and play for fitness, anytime, anywhere.

Assess for Fitness
Simple assessments to test your balance, flexibility and muscular endurance, which are essential in your day-to-day activities.

Step for Fitness
Fun activity involving memory and movement, which helps improve sensorimotor skills and cognition, and reduce fall-related injuries.

Play for Fitness
Great game to strengthen bonding through fun and strength-related exercises.

Sport, exercise and play all rolled in one!

*Size of Play Mat is 1.8m x 1.8m
